purpose: Enhance gameplay by providing an AI-driven agent for the Snake game, offering intelligent decision-making and strategy optimization.
principle: Utilizes reinforcement learning techniques to train the agent for optimal pathfinding and decision-making in the Snake game environment.
reusability: Can be integrated into existing Snake game projects as a module, offering configurable parameters for different gameplay scenarios.
limitations: Currently optimized for the classic Snake game; performance may vary with different game variations or rule sets.
name: SnakeAI
